summary:
Hunters Retreat is a player home with a Hunter theme.
The house is included with some basic features such as a tanning rack, cooking place, some sleeping places and a tanning/butcher chamber.

Besides the home you can find a lookout at the top of the tree that is accesable via the ladder on the side of the house.
descriptionHtml:
Here it is: Hunters Retreat

Hunters Retreat is a player home build between two large trees with a Hunter theme.
The house is included with some basic features such as a tanning rack, cooking place, some sleeping places and a tanning/butcher chamber.
Hunters Retreat is also included with a little office where you map out your huntings and there is a lookout/crownest if some scouting is needed.

There is a fishing spot down at the lake with a camp fire and such. Just across the other fellow hunter NPC.


If people have any suggestions pls let me know in the comments!




Mods that I have installed for the visual effects in the screenshots:

 - Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics Vision ENB - good performance; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105
 - Lush Trees; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3385
 - Lush Grass; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3288
 - Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802
 - WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268
author: Amtreble
